translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

In order to comply with what is required in your letter of the 16th of the present month, it is necessary that Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães. Chief of Police of the Department. Antônio Francisco dos Santos Abreu Residence of the Justice of the Peace of the department, November 20, 1841.

To the citizen Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, Chief of Police of the department of Boqueirão - Salso. From the Justice of the Peace of the same. Letter from the Justice of the Peace of the department dated November 20, received on the 22nd of the same month and answered on the same day.
